name: Thrashket Ball
description:
Play on the Github Page as well: https://ocaminty.github.io/Thrashket-GH-Page/

Total Content:

  • 3 Score Scoring Modes:
    • Classic: Every goal nets you one point. First to reach 10 points, wins!
    • Lives: Every goal nets you one point, and your opponent -1 points! First to reach 0 points loses.
    • Combo: Every goal sets your opponent to 0. First to reach 4 points wins!
  • 2 Modes:
    • Local: Play against a friend, where one player uses WASD, and the other uses Arrow Keys.
    • Vs CPU: Play against a (decently smart) Computer. You use Arrow Keys.
  • 4 Basketball Skins:
    • Default, Solar, Earth, Invisible, and Gold (locked).

v0.9.0

- Comeback settings. Loser gets more speed.
- Map layout changes, and map visual changes.
- Balls do not stop light.

v0.9.1

- Fixed comeback speed not resetting once you regain first place.
